title: FS: NEW 50+ Card Lot of Lower Grade T206  **ALL SOLD**
author: marcdelpercio

posts.post_title: FS: NEW 50+ Card Lot of Lower Grade T206  **ALL SOLD**
posts.post_content:
Hello. I have the following lot of T206 cards for sale or trade. These are mostly low to mid-grade cards as the scans will show. Even the lower grade cards in the group, for the most part, have nice eye appeal for the technical grade. Only a few beaters in this lot! 

Please add $2 shipping for 1-2 cards. For 3 or more, I will cover shipping. Payment via any method you prefer. Please send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] to purchase any cards or with any questions. Thanks for looking!

CARDS PICTURED: **All cards are sold.  Thank you!**
I will take the Wagner please. PM sent. :D
One bump for a price drop on all remaining cards before I send these to eBay.  Thanks for looking!

I bought two cards late Friday evening and I received them safely on Monday morning.  Thanks Marc!

Curt
